DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine the effectiveness of the PresVIEW Scleral Implant to improve near vision in patients who require reading glasses
DOC.brief_title: Trial of the PresView Implant for the Improvement of Near Vision in Presbyopic Patients
DOC.criteria: Age 45 or older at commencement of study Best Corrected Distance Visual Acuity of .80 (20/25) or better Patients must be alert, mentally competent, and able to comply with clinical study requirements Any previous eye surgeries including cataract, LASIK (laser in situ keratomileusis), or eye muscle surgery Any chronic systemic diseases such as diabetes, heart disease, Lupus, etc. Any eye diseases such as eye inflammation, infection, cataract, or retinal diseases
